name: MTÜ Butafoori Lasteklubi
membership: MTÜ Butafoori Lasteklubi is an independent non-profit organization which has had co-operation with Tallinn Centre's city government. In 2011 MTÜ Butafoori lasteklubi gained around 359 euros from Tallinn Centre's city goverment for art exhibition. Also in 2015 we received 100 euros for art exhibition from Tallinn Centre's city goverment. In 2016 we made contact with local chess club and attracted 2 members to join from there.
